name: A silver-zinc-sodium aluminosilicate zeolite containing up to 2.9 percent by weight of silver and 19 percent by weight of zinc. The finished zeolite will also contain small amounts of calcium metaphosphate, zinc oxide and silica.
FoodContactSubstance: A silver-zinc-sodium aluminosilicate zeolite containing up to 2.9 percent by weight of silver and 19 percent by weight of zinc. The finished zeolite will also contain small amounts of calcium metaphosphate, zinc oxide and silica.
